thread.title: Comment on Portable Solar Battery by Parash Lama
thread.title_full: Comment on Portable Solar Battery by Parash Lama

author: Parash Lama
title: Comment on Portable Solar Battery by Parash Lama
text:
Portable Solar Battery Posted 4 days ago 
SOS 20K is a portable solar battery designed with 20,000 mAh. It is Water and dustproof and is equipped with four 3-in-1 LED S.O.S signal lights. 
Specs Battery: Lithium Polymer, 1000+ Charge Cycles** Charging Input: 5V/2A Output (top 2): 5V/2.4A, 5V/1A Output (bottom 2): 5V/2.4A, 5V/1A Water/Dustproof: IP67 4x – 3 in 1 Led light: Torch, Strobe, SOS Solar output: 340mAh/h FULL 20K Charge Time: 10 Hours via Micro-USB, 59 Hours via Solar Measurements: 18.4 x 9.5 x 2.54 cm Weight: 472g (1.04 lbs) Operating Temps : 0-45 Degrees Celcius 2 Year Manufacturer’s Warranty 
  early bird prices are gone, but   $79.   Feb of 2016.
